case.name: MZXAF v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 167 (21 April 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: applicant a woman with culturally induced reluctance to divulge to men what had happened to her
indications in material in support of application that she had not divulged everything
tribunal member made no attempt to ascertain what more she might say
relevance of ministerial guidelines for dealing with gender-related claims
whether guidelines applicable to tribunal estoppel
res judicata , issue estoppel and anshun estoppel
previous proceedings in respect of same decision of refugee review tribunal
denial of procedural fairness not raised
could not have been raised in previous federal court proceeding
not raised in previous high court proceeding
application for order nisi dismissed by consent courts and judges
whether time limits in high court rules applicable in federal court
review of refugee review tribunal decision
review of refugee review tribunal decision

citances.sentence: This can be found in the judgments of North J on 11 December 2000 in S... v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural Affairs [2000] FCA 1961 ; Heerey J on 5 December 2003 in M52 and M53 of 2002 v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2003] FCA 1495 ; Black CJ, Dowsett and Bennett JJ on 6 May 2004 in Applicant M52 of 2002 v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2004] FCAFC 111 ; Riethmuller FM on 6 April 2005 in MZWGV v Minister for Immigration [2005] FMCA 980 ; Riethmuller FM on 2 June 2005 in MZXAF v Minister for Immigration [2005] FMCA 979 ; Gray J on 21 April 2006 in MZXAF v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 167 ; and Gummow and Heydon JJ on 5 October 2006 in MZXAF v MIMA & Anor [2006] HCATrans 550.
